page.shortlink: Empty Objects are Taking up Space on The Report
page.topic: Empty Objects are Taking up Space on The Report
page.description: A Report has controls that is taking up space when there is no content.

description.p: Unless the 'Can Shrink' property is on, controls on a Report will always take up the space. This is a requirement for pre-printed forms.
The Problem can be worse for controls that need a large initial size (like an image) to control their optimal rendering when they do exist.
The ability to toggle this is available in a couple places:

case.description: The Properties Task Panel exposes the 'Shrinkable' property for an object.
For convenience, the Right Click Menu for the Object has a 'Can Shrink' toggle at the bottom.
